skinTones.name: Fair
skinTones.description: Light complexion with a tendency to sunburn easily.

skinTones.name: Light
skinTones.description: Slightly darker than fair, with a moderate ability to tan.

skinTones.name: Medium
skinTones.description: Moderate skin tone, tans easily, and rarely burns.

skinTones.name: Olive
skinTones.description: A warm, tan complexion often associated with Mediterranean or Hispanic backgrounds.

skinTones.name: Tan
skinTones.description: Golden-brown complexion with a noticeable ability to tan.

skinTones.name: Dark
skinTones.description: Deeper brown to dark brown complexion, often associated with African, Indian, or Middle Eastern backgrounds.

skinTones.name: Ebony
skinTones.description: Very dark brown to black complexion, often associated with African backgrounds.

skinTones.name: Pale
skinTones.description: Extremely light complexion with minimal pigmentation.

skinTones.name: Alabaster
skinTones.description: Very pale and smooth complexion, often described as translucent and delicate.

skinTones.name: Golden
skinTones.description: Warm, golden undertones in the complexion, often associated with a sun-kissed look.
